get.name: get
get.comment: Get the current value (or default) of the specified key or all User Data for null key

set.name: set
set.comment: Set the value of a specified key

getUser.name: getUser
getUser.comment:
Lookup User using the Id, Username or email address
      automatically executed during class instantiation

login.name: login
login.comment: Login - verify username and password, handle remember request

isLoggedOn.name: isLoggedOn
isLoggedOn.comment: Verify if the User is Logged On

changePassword.name: changePassword
changePassword.comment: Change the password for a user

requestPasswordReset.name: requestPasswordReset
requestPasswordReset.comment: Generate a token and email a temporary link to change password and sends to user

verifySession.name: verifySession
verifySession.comment: Verifies the session given the action

verifyUser.name: verifyUser
verifyUser.comment: Is the user permitted to logon?

verifyFormToken.name: verifyFormToken
verifyFormToken.comment: Verifies the token for the user (guest or logged on)

verifyCredentials.name: verifyCredentials
verifyCredentials.comment: Used during login and other times username and password must be verified

verifySessionNotTimedOut.name: verifySessionNotTimedOut
verifySessionNotTimedOut.comment: Check to see if the Session has timed out

setSessionLogin.name: setSessionLogin
setSessionLogin.comment: Update the session for log in information

clearLoginAttempts.name: clearLoginAttempts
clearLoginAttempts.comment: Clear the number of login attempts

setCookie.name: setCookie
setCookie.comment: Sets an HTTP Cookie to be sent with the HTTP response

createHashString.name: createHashString
createHashString.comment:
Create Hash from the input string
     
      For use with passwords, the hash is what is stored in the database

verifyHashString.name: verifyHashString
verifyHashString.comment:
Verify Input String to Hash
     
      For use with passwords, the input is the real password, but the hash is from the database

getRandomToken.name: getRandomToken
getRandomToken.comment: Creates random string using base64 characters (a-zA-Z0-9./) for generating tokens

comment: User Facade to access to all user functions and data

load.name: load
load.comment: Get user data using a value for id, username, email or initialize new user

updateUserData.name: updateUserData
updateUserData.comment: Update User Data for loaded User

getSession.name: getSession
getSession.comment: Gets the value for a key

deleteSession.name: deleteSession
deleteSession.comment: Delete a single or all session keys

getFlashMessage.name: getFlashMessage
getFlashMessage.comment: Get Flash Messages for User, all or by Type

deleteFlashMessage.name: deleteFlashMessage
deleteFlashMessage.comment: Delete Flash Messages, all or by type

class_properties.name: property_array
class_properties.comment: List of Properties that will be sent via email

render.name: render
render.comment: Set the Option Values, Initiate Rendering, Send

class_properties.name: messages
class_properties.comment:
Error Messages
       Load with language specific messages via Constructor using IoCC

setFlashMessage.name: setFlashMessage
setFlashMessage.comment: Store Flash (User) Messages in FlashMessage for presentation after redirect

throwException.name: throwException
throwException.comment: Format Exception Message and throw the Exception

register.name: register
register.comment: Register User and email activation code

isRegistered.name: isRegistered
isRegistered.comment: Determine if this user is registered

isActivated.name: isActivated
isActivated.comment: Determine if this user registration has been activated

isSuspended.name: isSuspended
isSuspended.comment: Determine if this user was suspended

getSession.comment: Gets the value for a key

destroySession.comment: Destroy Session, including all key values and session id
